2164.subject: CST
2164.descrlong:
Provides students with the fundamental knowledge of computer architectures, hardware and software components of computer systems, interrelationship among different components. Coverage includes introduction to data representation, CPU, assembly programming, memory systems, input/output devices, pipelining, multi-processing systems, operating systems and network architecture.   (Credit/ No Credit Available)

(Prereq: CST 231 and MATH 170)
